MathMLElementMstyle.summary: The <mstyle> MathML element is used to change the style of its children.

blockquote.para: Note: Historically, this element accepted almost all the MathML attributes and it was used to override the default attribute values of its descendants. It was later restricted to only a few relevant styling attributes that were used in existing web pages. Nowadays, these styling attributes are common to all MathML elements and so <mstyle> is really just equivalent to an <mrow> element. However, <mstyle> may still be relevant for compatibility with MathML implementations outside browsers.
